info.name: Snow Leopard Awesome Bar
info.description:
This style changes the Awesome Bar results menu to closely mimic the look of the dock menus in Mac OS X Snow Leopard.

Complete the Snow Leopard series with these styles:
style 20883
style 21763
style 24273
style 21832
style 24724
style 28658
info.additionalInfo:
*** UPDATES ***

09-03-12: Added Firefox 15 support.
07-20-11: Updated for better compatibility with the theme, FXChrome.
07-21-10: Updated to make the selection image closer to the menu edges, for more authenticity.
03-17-10: Removed popout arrow and updated selection appearance.
02-23-10: Updated menu appearance by adding a popout arrow in the corner. Any feedback is greatly appreciated!
02-21-10: Appearance revamp: the background now exactly matches the Snow Leopard menus.
02-18-10: Updated selection. Now only fully works on Firefox 3.6.
02-02-10: Fixed bug where rows would alternate colors in the Foxdie themes.
01-22-10: Fixed URL color bug in Windows.
01-14-10: Updated menu appearance with transparent borders.
12-16-09: Fixed bug where selection bar would not stretch to the top entirely.
10-19-09: Added a new tag icon for tagged bookmarks.
10-19-09: Minor code tweaks; no visual changes.
10-18-09: Awesome Bar scrollbars are now hidden; please email me if you find any bugs.
10-18-09: Changed bookmarked results star to match the rest of the style.
10-13-09: Made text slightly more white.
10-13-09: No changes, just organized the code.
